As a result, the hallway and stairs were so congested and filled with not so pleasant smell. It also didn't seem appropriate to have scantily clad models crowd an area where corporate events were also holding.
I had a great experience. Their attention to customer service is commendable

Eko hotel is a cozy classy chic hotel to put up. I totally enjoyed my stay there. The food is great and the customer services are good. I have had to attend several events at the hotel too and all were top notch.Love love love üíò

The rooms need to be refurbished and cleaned properly, there's always something to complain about re: the bathrooms. Room service is terrible, and the fact that you're practically forced to order off a limited, overpriced menu once it's late isn't good customer service to me. It costs too much to stay there for such a disappointing level of service.

Eko Hotel and Suites is one of the best hotels in Lagos Nigeria. Its houses many things. It's a standard hotel, very classy, ambience environment with ocean view. A visit to Eko Hotel & Suites It's a memorable experience. But it's an expensive place but filled with enjoyable things.

Even though there were a couple of issues, the stay was very nice. The Duty managers during the day, evening and night are the absolute best at what they do. I wish I remembered their names but executives at the hotel should seriously Show their appreciation for the above average resolution responses to minimize complaints and excellent exceptional service displayed each time. My name is Rachel Holmes  from Atlanta Georgia and I really appreciate everybody........the guards, taxi drivers, room service,  Red Restaurant, receptionist,  etc for such a blessed experience. Stay at Echo peoples lolol
The food and service is top notch and the location is easily accessible.
Good for latest couples to relax and have some moments of romance.

Sanctuary of Luxury with great ChoicesLike the title of the. Review states, this property(and set of hotels &. Residences) is housed in a complex that is nestled in a green secluded area away from the chaos of the city, making it a sanctuary you‚Äôd never wanna leave. And it has a great range of options to dine and drink making it even harder to leave even if you wanted to!LOCATION:  Nice location on the ocean front and. Easy drive away from most points of interest!DINE + DRINK: A super huge range of choices to Dine,  Drink and party  the night out!. A killer rooftop bar and restaurant,  A swimming pool bar, A TexMEx Restaurant and bar are some of the samples. They. Even have their own IRISH PUB!!ROOM: We stayed in 404, so this review is based on that; VIEW: Spectacular view of the Atlantic ocean and the lagoon! ; SIZE: Very spacious room; AIR-CON: Perfectly functioning cooler that helped in setting the perfect room temperature; BED: Comfortable bed that played the expected part to put me to sleep; BATHROOM: Weakpoint of the room! Very dated bathtub with a super weak shower that was almost falling apart!; TOILETRIES: OK. Spa quality cosmeticsFACILITIES: Mindblowing Gym that is THE highlight of the place probably. A huge fitness center that comes fitted with all kinds of State of the art machines and workstations. Since it is open for local membership the place is extremely. Well maintained! The outdoor pool is great too. Super high quality and great for an Aqua workout or Lounging swim. Apart from this the place comes loaded with a ton of other Recreational activity. Options like Tennis court, Squash court etc.SERVICE: Friendly staff that took care of all my needs with a smile and made us feel comfortable and well taken care of.HOW WIRED YOU WILL BE: Free high speed Wi-Fi that works well all over the property. Big Plasma TV screen dishing out dozens of channels spanning sports, news, music, movies and a wide variety of entertainment in multiple languages

Excellent hotel! Diverse amenities and things to do. It has a great pool, gym and fitness centre, rooms are very spacious. Several restaurants to choose from with diverse food and great environment. Stakehouse is highly recommend
The view from the rooftop bar is amazing. So wonderful.Go there, get a good drink, sit down, and take it all in.Lagos looks amazing from up there.
Nice upscale hotel. Enjoyed sitting by the poolside while I reflected and watched people go by!This hotel hosts major events in the city of Lagos, something interesting is always happening here.
The structure and luxury are all in perfection to suite your comfort.

Amazing place!! The ambience was lovely, food and drinks were fabulous (though expensive, but it's Eko Hotel we are talking about). The room I stayed was just fantastic, bathroom was the best I have seen in Nigeria and the service was just excellent.
The rooms are nice. Great food. If you are lodging at the hotel better to go  to the restaurant for buffet than room service because of limited choice of food. Swimming pool area is too open.

Always cool. Always satisfying! Eko Hotel is an elaborate expression of luxury. A few hitches with their event halls might be experienced. But there are often more highs than whatever low you might find.

One of the best among hotels in Lagos well secured. In terms of security you are secured when you lodge. The facilities are there, good service, have enough space for parking vehicles. Controls are there to check unwanted guess.

Rest rooms a ok, not smelly but could be much cleaner.

Eko hotel is a classy hotel in Lagos Island with quality service that speaks for itself. The environment is serene, with an outdoor bar around the pool area. Food and drinks are quite pricey but you'll get value for every penny you spend.
Eko hotel will forever remain one of the best and luxury very secured. Close to the ocean good viewing is just so much amazing.

Was at the Signature. Good service. The food was not top notch for me. Could be a lot better for a Signature restaurant. Had fried chicken with mashed potatoes. The potatoes was getting cold by the time i was served.

Eko hotel... that‚Äôs the signature not the old arm of the hotel. The old arm of the hotel needs total overhauling, rooms are terrible.The signature suites is the new hotel. Everything is in accordance/up to date with technology compared to the traditional hotel. Everything is automated - the phone, Tv are all customized to the guests name. I also love the fact you can view your bill summary on Tv- so you know when you are shooting the roofüòÑRoom services - meals takes between 15 - 35mins depending on your order but be assured the meal will arrive at the exact time.Professional staff.Room is clean. Eko Hotel and Suites is a premium business facility located on Victoria Island, Lagos. It boasts a grand ballroom, a great indoor exhibition space, state-of-the-art meeting rooms with complete AV systems. The environment is chic and to their kudos, is constantly refurbished. Cozy accommodation, an assortment of restaurants, a swimming pool ... professional service and top-class security.

One of the most popular hotel in Lagos. Their pool side is readily accessible and can be a great venue for meetup for a few number of people. The compound is huge, so no parking challenges. It has shops for purchase of local crafts and cultural souvenirs, which make it a leading choice for tourists that are looking for beautiful souvenirs.
There are multiple hotels in the compound- great food and many restaurants plus fitness facilities and big pool. I liked the rooftop bar and Thai restaurant the most. Nice cool air conditioned rooms.

Vibe - The best parts are the long bar that is overlooked by several large ample outdoor space between a large patio and a covered patio that can be sealed up in colder weather. The colors are bright and fresh and the music is modern, but not too loud to impede conversation. The place is kid-friendly for the right time of day.Quality - nothing negative to say here. The ingredients always look to be top-notch and are always cooked properly. The beer I've had from them is consistent and without flaws.Sevice - Order food and drinks either at the bar or a walk-up line, so no true table service, but the food runners also bus tables. Every time I've been, the tone has been professional, efficient and friendly.Selection - the food selection is all Asian street food, but skews to various Asian cultures. The beer is dominated by hops and kettle sours, both of which they do well. There are a few other styles they hit as well--stout, porter, coffee cream ale, etc, but hops and sours are what they do best.Food - The one thing I typically mention to people I tell about HOMES is the fact that their beer is really fantastic, but that their food menu may be even better. The menu rotates seasonally, but always consists of a mix of Asian street food. Bulgogi fries are a favorite of mine, and they always have some kind of bowl and a few different types of bao on the menu.Overall, I like Eko Hotels because it's a very professional operation. They have a clear vision of what they want to be and are doing that extremely well. Highlights for me are the new Bahn Mi, the pork belly Bao and the Bulgogi fries. I can't really pick a favorite beer, but some of the best hops are Same Same Different (their flagship), Crumple and Laser Light Show and some of the best sours are the Guava Sherbet, Double Cherry Sherbet and Blurb.
Good place to relax by swimming pool and good environment for meetings and meetup.Nice place to hold events of any size and capacity

Eko Hotel and Suites is a renowned hotel in Lagos in the heart of Victoria Island. It has 4 subdivisions namely Eko Gardens, Eko Signature, Eko Hotel and Eko Suites.It also houses a number of bars and restaurants where you can go on dates, have business meetings or just chill with friends after a long day at work.The Pool Bar, (which is basically a bar by the pool üòÑ), is a nice place to relax with friends.Crossroads restaurant is quickly becoming a favorite for a lot of folks, especially on Wednesdays when they have the TexMex night and you get unlimited Margaritas and Tacos for N11,000.00.Red restaurant which is on the roof is also another favorite for people looking for a romantic night out with the view from the top of Eko Hotel adding to ambience and setting g the right mood.

Eko Hotels & Suites is nice. I especially like the central cooling/heating system + hot water (there's no heater switch you need to flip; hot water always runs when you turn the tap to the left). Of course, the central cooling/heating comes with a regulator for each room.There's also a verandah with a great view of other V/I buildings and nearby streets. Cable TV is great too; it has a relatively wide range of channels. There's a hair dryer in the bathroom. There are lots of parking spaces all over and quite a number of security men around so your car should be safe. There are several restaurants too and an ATM if you need cash (I used the FCMB machine, it dispenses "mint" 1k notes.Receptionists are nice and respectful. Room service is good too. As per the rates, you should expect it won't be cheap; between 50k+ & 60k+ for a standard room (double sized bed).
Wonderful view of the ocean and the artificial lake. Good facilities, even if a little old. The TV Channels are fuzzy. Bedspreads look old.

Stayed in Eko suites during 2007. It was in bad shape at that time. I shifted to Protea hotel after 2 days. Now in 2019, it is back to its Golden days. Ambience, food, facilities all upscaled. I love to spend some time in the evening, in front of the pool area and have their awesome Suya sticks with the good selection of beverages.
Huge hotel property. It has good F&B outlets and something for everyone.
Elegant place to visit. The ambiance is awesome! The personals are equally professional and courteous.

Am a mobile massage therapist that walk around to meet her clients for massage sessions, in their homes or hotel so I move around alot... And for this reasons I I have the opportunity to visit alot of hotels to meet with my clients.I was at eko hotel earlier today for a session with my clients, which I have had over 20 clients in this hotel before today and today I was embarrassed by a security who indirectly called me a thief.Before I entry any hotel I always tell them the work I do and if they need to search my bag, and they said no they dont do that, today I told the security the same thing and he said not he isnt suppose to... On my way out after my session I was stopped by this same security, opens my bag and started bringing my sheets towels out one after tge other, opened them to the public, making all soft of words, if he finds any of the hotel towels inside my bag he will take it, I was like are you calling me a their or what, did any one called and asked you to stop me at the gate.... I was surprised at this act today, I have never been this humiliated in my whole life, I got mad and reported the issue at the hotel because I had to go back, I couldn't take the insult,My question now is does tgis suppose to happen, what are we turning it in this country and why cant we respect one another been our size or not.... Please I beg Eko hotel,to do something about this issue so it dont repeat itself again, I will not ever book a room in tgis place or recommend to any of my friends or clients because of this incident

Arguably Nigeria's most sophisticated 5-star hotel, Eko Hotel is located along the Lagos - Atlantic Ocean shoreline. This architectural fact on it's own scores it very high as a tourist haven.It's the choice location for Nigeria's high and mighty's social functions, corporate events as well as high octane musical concerts which usually peak from mid-November till early January (yuletide season).The popular conference/convention center seats about 5,000 people which makes it top choice for event planners and brand managers. There are lots of restaurants offering local and intercontinental cuisines. A swimming pool bordering the Atlantic coast shares boundary with a beautiful garden as well a private beach.A gym is available too as well as children play areas. Security is well coordinated and service is impeccable most of the times. Eko Hotel is arguably Nigeria's most popular, frequented and talked about 5-star hotel. Her internet mentions support the above fact.
Great food, peaceful and cozy environment for family, friends and spouse if you have the right budget.

If you are lodging here for the first time or inviting someone to meet you there,  the first thing you should note is that they have four Lobbies!  Therefore,  you should note that although the entire premises is referred to as "Eko Hotel",  you need to be more specific about where you are.  For instance,  you  may  be at "Eko Signatures"  which has one of the Lobbies within "Eko Hotel" but of if you just say you are at Eko Hotel,  your visitor may have a hard time locating you.

Eko Hotels deserves more than a a five star rating. the Rooms are classy and exotic. Ambience is modern, and luxuriously top notch. Being here is like riding an epicurean escalator, the environment is multicultural and the architectural design allows you to move from lobby to bar and then to pool side without feeling that much has changed around you. If you are not kobo sensitive and love to splurge then go to Eko Hotel. The only limit to your enjoyment is the depth of your pocket. The views are breathtaking depending on the wing. Eko Hotels & Suites is the most preferred hotel in West Africa and it‚Äôs all about the right mix! Located in the heart of Victoria Island and shielded from the hustle and bustle of the Lagos metropolis, we offer our corporate clients and walk in guests a perfect blend of relaxation, activities, and African tradition delicately infused to meet the highest international standards.Overlooking the Eko Atlantic City and Ocean, it is just a 10-minute drive to the City Centre and only 45minutes away from the Airport.The hotels are designed for your comfort and convenience. Your security is our primary concern and you‚Äôll find our customer care second to none.The hotel has taken important steps to live up to West Africa‚Äôs future model in the hospitality sector. With the best conference and banqueting facilities, tastefully furnished to a 7000-seater capacity, a world-class swimming pool, 824 excellently furnished rooms spread across 4 hotels: EKO SIGNATURE, EKO SUITES, EKO HOTEL AND EKO GARDENS, mostly with a choice of city and sea views. Eko Hotel have 8 different restaurants and 7 different bars serving a range of international cuisines, amongst other facilities.The hotel is equipped with a state of the art health and fitness centre comprising of a gym, a tennis/basket ball court, a volley ball court, a sauna, spa, salon, and nail studio. The have an in-house medical clinic as well.The host the best themed buffet every Friday evening where we serve specialties across the globe: Africa, Asia, America, Italy, Mexico Middle East and Mongolia amongst others.

Eko Hotel & Suites is a 5-Star ultra luxurious hotel standing elegantly in Victoria Island, Lagos. It is built on the exclusive Victoria Island and blends natural beauty and architectural aesthetics in the most astonishing manner. It's spread over three buildings with spectacular views of the Atlantic Ocean and the Kuramo Lagoon.Eko Hotel & Suites boasts 824 awe-inspiring rooms across its 4 hotel subdivisions which are: Eko Signature, Eko Gardens, Eko Hotel and Eko Suites. The Eko Signature has room categories, such as Club Suite, Premium Suite, Signature Suite and Presidential Suite. The Eko Gardens is categorised into Standard Room and Classic Room. The Eko Suites has room categorised into Deluxe, Studio Suite and Executive Suite. And lastly, the Eko Hotel, with 448 rooms, is categorised into Classic Suite, Classic Superior Room, Atlantic Superior Room, Diplomatic Suite and Presidential Suite Superior room. They are all adorned with a breathtaking interior decor and grand facilities. The room awesome amenities in the rooms include: Luxurious Double and Single beds, Intercom System, armchairs, sofas and centre tables, air-conditioners, work desks and chairs, wireless internet accessibility, flat-screen television sets with local and international channels, refrigerators and en-suite bathrooms with state-of-the-art bathroom facilities.Eko Hotel Lagos also offers a wide range of world-class hotel services, such as: State-of-the-art meeting rooms, outdoor pool with surrounding sit out, fitness centre complimented by a well-equipped gym, event halls, an array of restaurants that offer mouth-watering dishes from different parts of the world, bar/lounge fitted with choice drinks, top-notch security arrangement, ample parking space, uninterrupted power supply, conference and banquet facilities plus a large convention center. Recreational facilities available are lawn tennis, volleyball and basketball.
